property.name: maven.aspectj.verbose
property.description: If true, emit compiler status messages during the compile.

property.name: maven.aspectj.fork
property.description: Run process in another VM. This gets the forking classpath either explicitly from a forkclasspath entry or by searching the task or system/Ant classpath for the first readable file with a name of the form aspectj{-}tools{.*}.jar. When forking you can specify the amount of memory used with maxmem. Fork cannot be used in incremental mode, unless using a tag file.

property.name: maven.aspectj.incremental
property.description: incremental mode: Build once, then recompile only required source files when user provides input.

property.name: maven.aspectj.time
property.description: If true, display speed information during weaving.

property.name: maven.aspectj.maxmem
property.description: The maximum memory to use for the new VM when fork is true. Values should have the same form as accepted by the VM, e.g., "128m".

property.name: maven.aspectj.debug
property.description: If true, run in debug mode

property.name: maven.aspectj.sourceRootCopyFilter
property.description: List of resource files to exclude when copying resources from the input jar to the weaved output jar

property.name: maven.aspectj.emacssym
property.description: If true, emit .ajesym symbol files for Emacs support

property.name: maven.aspectj.source
property.description: The J2SE source compliance level. Valid values are [1.3 1.4]. Defaults to 1.3.
